div:
These lecture notes are provided on an ad-hoc basis. I will write them when (or if) I have time. My goal is for you to compare these notes with your own so that you can determine the quality of your note taking abilities.
(let ([counter 0] [number->file (lambda (x) (format "~a.html" x))]) (map (lambda (x) (set! counter (+ counter 1)) `(tr (td ([align "right"]) ,(number->string counter)) (td ([align "left"]) (a ([href ,(number->file counter)]) ,x)))) titles*))
